nodes.text: The Revels was an entertainment district in Talos, Atzerri that, due to the nature of the district, was frequently filled with crowds of exuberant beings. There was a general admission at the front gate. It offered dozens of recreation centers, casinos, and club bars, with such activities as Point 5, Shockball, personal combat simulators, and an attraction offering near-death experiences and million credit insurance.

Luke Skywalker as "Li Stonn" wandered around The Revels while attempting to read The Secrets of Jedi Power, however realized that the only places to sit were inside the establishments, where money could be spent.
